import { data } from 'jquery'; import React from 'react' export default class PerformSaleComponent extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { itemType: '', brand: '', itemModel: '', processor: '', ramSize: '', hddSize: '', quantity: '', unitPrice: '', generation: '', cart: [], laptopBrandVisibility: false, } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } data = require('../../testData/inventory') handleChange = async (evt) => { const value = evt.target.value; const name = evt.target.name; //console.log(this.data) await this.setState({ ...this.state, [name]: value }); if (value === 'Laptop') { await this.setState({ ...this.state, laptopBrandVisibility: !this.state.laptopBrandVisibility }); } } laptopBrand = () => { return
} addItem = (item) => { } printInventory = (fi) => { let inventory = this.data console.log(inventory) return inventory.map((item, index) => { if (item.itemType === fi) { return {index + 1} {item.itemDescription} {item.quantity} } }) } render() { return
Search Item Needed For Purchase
{this.state.laptopBrandVisibility && this.laptopBrand()}

Current Inventory
{this.printInventory(this.state.itemType)}
# Item Description Current Stock Action
Cart

} }
